description:
Welcome to our module on “Purchase and Warehouse Management”. Today’s marketplace offers almost limitless options to the customers because of the stiff competition. This makes customers’ expectations high in terms of quality, features, price, etc. The company’s today hence, can no longer focus only on making their products available to the market. In order to remain competitive, it has become a necessity to implement the elements of purchase and supply management.

This course is designed in a way that will teach you how to effectively manage the end-to-end flow of materials in an organization. It will equip you with all the necessary tools that will be helpful to you even beyond the internal operations.

The second section is on warehouse management. Warehouse operations being external to an organization is usually not given the due importance as it’s not considered a core activity.

This course outlines some of the common problems faced in warehouse operations and proposes some very efficient solutions, tips and strategies to face these challenges.
title: Excellence in Purhase and Warehouse Management
